Presently I'm in South Korea for investment projects with my own share of the total sum.  Meanwhile i didn't forget you're past efforts and attempts to assist me in transferring those funds despite that it failed us some how.Now contact my secretary in Nigeria her name is MISS.Rose Hellen  and her email address is (rosehellen_2007@yahoo.com) ask her to send you the total $2,000,000 which I kept for your compensation for all your past efforts and attempts to assist me in this matter.I appreciated your efforts at that time very much .so feel free and get intouch with my secretary MISS. Rose Hellen and instruct her where to send the amount to you.  Please do let me know immediately you receive it so that we can share the joy after all the sufferings at that time. I'm very busy here because of the investment projects which me and the new partner are having at hand,finally, remember that I had forwarded instruction to My secretary on your behalf to receive those moneys feel free to get in touch with Miss.Rose Hellen she will send the amount to you without any delay.
With best regards,
Rose Hellen

Miss Rose,

I got some message about a diplomatic courier. Unfortunately they provided no time for when they are arriving, which is very strange.

As you know, I live in Washington DC.  This week I am traveling to Idaho because my stepfather is very ill.  If you hear from the diplomats, please direct them to Idoaho for this week and I will meet their flight at the airport.

messages.body:
<d1plomaticcourier@myway.com>

Attn: Unkindly Contributor

We are indeed glad to inform you that remittance allocation quota # D.C.S 2/5/hbnplc-fod for immediate payment of $35.5m in ur favour has been released.Based on the recent policy of the Diplomatic Courier Services and with the view of checking money laundering and terrorism,the entire Management of this Company has approved to pay you through Diplomatic Courier Service (D.C.S).

The sum $35.5m (thirty five million Five Hundred thousand United States Dollars USD) will be dispatched through D.C.S today to ur mailing address,You will be contacted by the Courier Diplomat once the arrive United States of America.

You are also advised to get ready with the sum of $4,500 being Tag Clearance Fee to be paid once the consignment arrive in your Country (USA).

Note that the diplomats do not know in any way the content of the consignment rather they are informed that it's just personal belongings. 

Mr Dominic Wilson (Diplomat) of Diplomatic Courier Service will leave here today 28january 2006 with the Consignment ($35.5m) under diplomatic immunity for USA.

Thanks and Congratulations!

Yours Faithfully,

MR. Johnson Peter's.

(DIRECTOR) 

TEL+234-1-4735912

messages.body:
Miss Rose,

Let me say how deeply hurt I am by your email.  After all we have shared, after all the promises you made you now pretend you do not even know my name.  

After all the talk of spending our lives together you do not know my name?  After all the calls you do not know my phone number?

You are breaking my heart.

I have set up a number for the diplomats to use.  They can call me on 206-339-3847 and if I am busy it will take a voice message or receive a fax.  

I WILL ALWAYS RELY ON EMAIL OVER PHONE SO THERE IS NO CONFUSION.  DO NOT LEAVE ME VOICE MAILS THAT JUST SAY TO CALL YOU WITH NO REASON FOR IT.  SUCH CALLS WILL BE IGNORED.

TELL THEM THAT SO THEY DO NOT WASTE MY TIME.

My address is the same as the one you said would one day be your home - xxx Washington DC. But as you know I am traveling at the moment for my family.

When are you arriving?  Or have you forgotten that
too?
